Package com.dragonboatrace.tools

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dragonboatrace.tools.Configuration
  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class used to hold settings
    Author:
    Benji Garment, Joe Wrieden

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean FULLSCREEN
      If the game is fullscreen or not.
      static int HEIGHT
      The height of the window.
      static int OBSTACLE_COLLISION_PENALTY
      The velocity penalty given when a collision occurs
      static float OBSTACLE_COLLISION_TIME
      The the boat must wait before moving again after a collision.
      static int PLAYER_COUNT
      The number of boats in the game, including the player itself.
      static int SCALAR
      The global scalar at which to scale entities.
      static int STAMINA_SPEED_DIVISION
      Reduces the scalar that stamina gives when accelerating, see Boat.velocityPercentage()
      static int WIDTH
      The width of the window.
